item.title: Project 2: Happiness Rate across countries
item.description: The mean of the “Ladder score” column is just above 5 out of 10, which indicates that the countries in the dataset are not very happy. The “Freedom to make life choices” column seems to have a positive correlation with happiness, as shown by the scatterplot. This means that countries where people have more freedom to make choices in their life tend to be happier. The “Social support” column also seems to have a positive correlation with happiness.

item.title: Project 3: Analyzing Covid-19 Deaths & Vaccinations Data.
About
item.description: Hi there! My name is Abdel Rahman, and I’m currently a data science student with a passion for sports and health. I’ve been interested in sports since I was a kid, and that interest has only grown as I’ve gotten older. As someone who values their health and wellbeing, I make it a point to stay active and maintain a healthy lifestyle. In addition to my love of sports and fitness, I’m also extremely dedicated to my studies.
